Attribute.AttributeName: Microsoft.ML.Runtime.EntryPoints.TlcModule/EntryPoint(Desc="Produces a bag of counts of ngrams (sequences of consecutive values of length 1-n) in a given vector of keys. It does so by building a dictionary of ngrams and using the id in the dictionary as the index in the bag.", Name="Transforms.NGramTranslator", ShortName="NgramTransform", UserName="NGram Transform", XmlInclude=new System.String[] { "<include file='../Microsoft.ML.Transforms/Text/doc.xml' path='doc/members/member[@name="NgramTranslator"]/*' />" })
